extension.description: CloudSync V3 delivers instant synchronization of watched status, resume points, and favorites across multiple Kodi devices using lightweight MQTT messaging. Features real-time updates, HiveMQ Cloud integration, and zero-conflict add-only favorites sync. Note: Favorites are only added automatically - manual removal required on each device.
extension.news: v3.0.0 - Add-only favorites sync with anti-loop protection - Prevents sync wars between devices - Only syncs favorite additions (manual removal required) - 10-second anti-loop grace period - Fixed sync_favorites setting check v2.0.2 - Fixed addon ID references and repository structure v2.0.1 - Repository automation update v2.0.0 - Initial release with MQTT-first architecture
